Class RixkUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.snu.rixk.model.RixkUtils

  • public class RixkUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    RixkUtils Contains general utilities that many Rixk classes need to utilize.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:

      • getFilenamesInDirectory

        public static java.lang.String[] getFilenamesInDirectory(java.lang.String directoryPath,
                                                         java.lang.String extension)
        Gets the names of all of the files in the directory on file system. An extension can be specified to only select files of that extension. If the extension is null, all files in the directory will be displayed.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - The path to the directory on file system
        extension - The file extension wanted
        Returns:
        The list of filenames

      • getRandomInteger

        Returns a randomly generated int from range min to max including both min and max.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum random int
        max - The maximum random int
        Returns:
        A random int

      • loadRixkMap

        public static RixkMap loadRixkMap(java.lang.String filename)
        Validates that a map file is correctly formatted and then loads the contents into a RixkMap object. Returns null if the RixkMap load failed.
        Parameters:
        filename - The map file to load in
        Returns:
        A RixkMap as specified in the map file

        Parameters:

        Returns:
